description.value:
Special: Daemon Wep, Balanced, Flame, Proven (3)

Note: Weapon: Great Sword. Daemon WP 70 (Khorne Daemon), Bind Str 4. Att.: Howling, Piercing, Rampage. Can make [Ranged] Attack. Gain Fear(+1) whenever attacking, add Daemon's WP Bonus to critical damage, every other round when charging can attack all within 1m. Must have Mark of Khorne to Wield.
